title: The 2024 Salsa Cycles Stormchaser Now Comes in a Suspension Option
content:
Stormchaser is Salsa‘s gravel bike built for adverse conditions. Choose the all-new geared suspension version for comfort and control on jarring roads or the single-speed setup for added durability when the dirt turns to mud. Let’s check out the new Stormchaser offerings below…

Stormchaser Single Speed returns in a new Storm Gray color. Price: $1799 USD.

Specs:

  • 6066-T6 aluminum frame
  • Class 5™ VRS (Vibration Reduction System)
  • Gravel race geometry
  • Carbon fiber fork
  • Alternator Flat Mount dropout
  • Extra mud clearance and abrasion-resistant fork plates
  • Rack mounts, Three-Pack mounts, and top-tube and down-tube accessory mounts
  • Fender mounts
  • Stealth dropper post routing
  • Includes 17t and 18t cog installed

Stormchaser Apex Eagle SUS brings more capability in a new Berry color. Price: $3199 USD.
Specs:

  • 6066-T6 aluminum frame
  • Class 5™ VRS (Vibration Reduction System)
  • Gravel race geometry
  • RockShox Rudy XPLR 40mm travel fork
  • Dropper post
  • Alternator Flat Mount dropout
  • Extra mud clearance
  • Rack mounts, top-tube and down-tube accessory mounts
  • Fender mounts

Stormchaser Frameset is available in black. Price: $1249 USD.
Specs:

  • 6066-T6 aluminum frame
  • Class 5™ VRS (Vibration Reduction System)
  • Gravel race geometry
  • Carbon fiber fork
  • Alternator Flat Mount dropout
  • Extra mud clearance and abrasion-resistant fork plates
  • Rack mounts, Three-Pack mounts, and top-tube and down-tube accessory mounts
  • Fender mounts
  • Stealth dropper post routing
  • Includes headset, axles, seatpost collar, and both single-speed and geared dropout plates

See the full lineup at Salsa.
